mechanism.description: Habitat preference for dense, humid forests

evidence.title: Anoiapithecus - Wikipedia
evidence.author: Wikipedia Contributors
evidence.citation: Wikipedia contributors. (2024). Anoiapithecus. In Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia.
evidence.note: Based on climatic changes recorded in the Abocador de Can Mata stratigraphic sequence in Spain, A. brevirostris appears to have had a habitat preference for dense, humid forests
